properties.name: Apache Log4j Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
properties.vulnerability_name: Apache Log4j Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
properties.short_description: Apache Log4j2 contains a vulnerability where a remote attacker can execute arbitrary code.
properties.description: Apache Log4j2 contains a vulnerability where a remote attacker can execute arbitrary code.
properties.required_action: Apply updates per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if updates are unavailable.
properties.remediation: Apply updates per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if updates are unavailable.

properties.name: Microsoft Outlook Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability
properties.vulnerability_name: Microsoft Outlook Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability
properties.short_description: Microsoft Outlook contains an elevation of privilege vulnerability that can be exploited to gain access to a user's Net-NTLMv2 hash.
properties.description: Microsoft Outlook contains an elevation of privilege vulnerability that can be exploited to gain access to a user's Net-NTLMv2 hash.
properties.required_action: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.
properties.remediation: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.
